did.head: Collection Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Smith College. Dept. of East Asian Studies.

did.unittitle: Department of East Asian Studies Records
did.abstract: This collection is in three folders and contains black and white photographs, newspaper articles, mid-year and final exams, and department announcements.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The East Asian studies major began in the 1988-1989 academic year at Smith College.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The East Asian Studies Department records contain materials describing the history of the department. Types of materials include black and white photos of professors and student club members, newspaper articles, department announcements, faculty and course outline, and mid-year and final exam questions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College. Dept. of East Asian Studies Records, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The East Asian Studies Department records were created by the department and tranferred to the College Archives.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Researchers should also view: RG 42. Faculty
